attributes.action: Close down construction sites to stop spread of Covid 19.
attributes.additional_details: Also, as construction is a potentially dangerous profession, then the chances of injuries, therefore having to go to hospital is quite high.
attributes.background: Lots of people in the construction undustry are congregating on building sites, large and small. The workers often have to travel a long way to get to their work. So, when they go home, if they have the Covid-19 virus, then they are spreading it over a very wide area.
